paper_keywords: symmetrical Heyting algebras of order n
paper_abstract: A completeness theorem is proved for SH(n) and SHK(n)-based logics with respect to a Kripke-style semantics. We also give a relational semantics for these calculi such that formulas are interpreted as binary relations.
paper_title: A Kripke-style and relational semantics for logics based on Lukasiewicz algebras
